summary: Desperate to improve their social status, four best friends enter into an all-night scavenger hunt against the popular clique in their school.
cast: Alexa PenaVega|Mika Boorem|Jane Lynch|Sam Huntington|Sara Paxton|Brie Larson|Scout Taylor-Compton|Douglas Smith|Katija Pevec|Steve Carell|Jeff Garlin|Kallie Flynn Childress|Eileen Boylan|Evan Peters|Hunter Parrish|Shane Hunter|Sean Faris|Ryan Slattery|Thad Luckinbill|Brett Wagner|Scoot McNairy|Johnny Sneed|Courtnee Draper|Ursula Whittaker|Brooklyn McLinn|Timothy Dowling|Alice Greczyn|Colleen Wainwright|Summer Glau|Max Van Ville|Mageina Tovah|Alison Martin|Allister|Mike Leverence|Kyle Lewis|Scott Murphy|Tim Rogner|Robert Alesandro|Amy Caron|David Daskal|Rose Davidson|Jacob Gray|Laura Monteiro|Martin Pierron|Cassie Townsend|Krizia Vega|Kelsey Wedeen
title: Sleepover
